Title: The Client List
Actors: Jennifer Love Hewitt, Colin Egglesfield, Cybill Shepherd, Loretta Devine, Brian Hallisay, Rebecca Field
Plot: Riley is a single mother living in a small Texas town and leading a shocking double life. Her secret would send shockwaves through the community and possibly land her in jail if it was ever exposed. Riley's taken a job at a seemingly traditional day spa, but soon realizes that the parlor offers a little more than just massage therapy. It's not the happy ending she was expecting but it does open her eyes to a world she's never seen before.
